availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edmond W. Huggins (Monroe County, KY, druggist)

body.p: Monroe County, Kentucky, druggist. Kentucky native. Married to Octavia Davie in Williamson County, Tennessee, on November 1, 1854. Father of Julia Huggins and Rosa B. Huggins. Resident of Monroe County, Kentucky, in 1860. Druggist in Monroe County in February 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Monroe County, p. 191.
Tennessee State Marriages, 1780-2002, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Williamson County, 1800 - 1866: Marriages 3, p. 19.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Monroe County, KY, February 1864, p. 77.
